attributes.action: Make it law for pet food manufacturers to inform customers of ingredient changes
attributes.additional_details:
Make it law ‘LOGAN’S law to tell people if pet food has any ingredient changes around the known allergens in exactly the same way we do for humans.

Pets can die or become seriously ill if they consume things they are allergic to , just like people but currently there are no laws in place to protect our pets .
attributes.background:
Make it law that any ingredient changes in dog food should be made public by adding notifications to packaging and on line when ordering.
Logan has an allergy to wheat his normal pet food ingredients had changed without any notification. This led to him becoming very poorly on several occasions.

rejection.details:
You already have this petition open:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/642063
